aggregates.max: Max - The maximum value recorded during a time interval. A higher maximum value could have occurred without it being recorded.
aggregates.average: Avg - The average of values recorded during a time interval.
aggregates.total: Total - Sum of the values recorded for each node during a time interval.
aggregates.min: Min - The minimal value recorded during a time interval. A lower minimal value could have occurred without it being recorded.

read-coordinator-nonreplica.description: Rate of coordinated reads to a node where that node is not a replica for that partition.
read-coordinator-nonreplica.label: Read Requests - Local Node Non Replica

read-coordinator-preferother.description: Rate of coordinated reads to a node where that node did not choose itself as a replica for the read request.
read-coordinator-preferother.label: Read Requests - Preferred Other Replicas

hints-on-disk.description: The number of hints currently stored on disk, to be replayed to peers.
hints-on-disk.label: Hints on Disk

hint-replay-success-rate.description: Rate of successful individual hint replays to peers.  If one or more individual hints fail to replay in a batch, the successful hints in that batch will be replayed again and double counted in this metric.
hint-replay-success-rate.label: Hint Replay Success Rate

hint-replay-error-rate.description: Rate of failed individual hint replays.  Replay of a single hint can fail more than once if retried.
hint-replay-error-rate.label: Hint Replay Error Rate

hint-replay-timeout-rate.description: Rate of timed out individual hint replays.  Replay of a single hint can timeout more than once if retried.
hint-replay-timeout-rate.label: Hint Replay Timeout Rate

hint-replay-received-rate.description: Rate of successful individual hints replayed to this node, from other peers.
hint-replay-received-rate.label: Hint Replay Received Rate
